channel.title: Donation in-server
channel.description: how can i make it where people can donate like like 500m and become a donator, where it adds there name on the donator list and everything? ive looked i was thinking i could change the ipban code to write to donators instead of ipbans and to no ipban them tho, but i cant figure out how i would make them pay, can someone help me?

item.title: Donation in-server
item.dc:creator: @mad_moparscapian mad_moparscapian
item.description:
@mad_moparscapian wrote:

you could make them have to use money on a chest and when the money gets used on the chest it gives them a rank say, player rights 6 which you could add onto your login list to make it say “The Donater; (playername) has logged in.”

Give me a min or so and i will post a code.

case 4253: //Donater Chest if (playerHasItemAmount(995, 500000000) c.playerRights = 6; //donater rank c.savemoreinfo(); c.savechar(); c.disconnected = true; PlayerHandler.messageToAll = (name + " is now a Donater"); { else if if (playerHasItemAmount(995, 499999999) } sendMessage("Sorry you need 500m to become a donater"); sendMessage("go get some more money"); } }

And add this with teh rest of your log-in messages

else if (playerRights == 6) { PlayerHandler.messageToAll = "The Donater " +playerName+ " has logged in."; }

Read full topic
